content: What 2004 movie, starring Kate Winslet and Jim Carrey, revolves around a couple who undergo a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories?

That sounds like "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind," but that was released in 2004 and stars Jim Carrey and Kate Winslet. However, in that movie, they undergo a procedure to have their memories of each other erased because their relationship ended badly. Is that the one you're thinking of?
